::Aerotaur::
    "Definitely.  But hurry up.  I'm not sure how much time we have before 
the next assault."  He walks outside the base and stands next to Nightlight.  
He watches Trinity and Zeni playing with Zero for a while before looking over 
to her.  "Are you angry at me?"
